thread.title: Acting, rugby, SRK: Sidharth Malhotra bonds with students in Auckland
thread.title_full: Acting, rugby, SRK: Sidharth Malhotra bonds with students in Auckland - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Acting, rugby, SRK: Sidharth Malhotra bonds with students in Auckland
text: The moment he said "Kia Ora" -- an informal way of saying "Hi" in Maori language -- and drew its comparison with the Punjabi "Ki ho riya hai (what's up?)", Bollywood actor Sidharth Malhotra managed to establish a closer connect with around 35 students at the University of Auckland Business School here on Sunday. The ... Â»
